description: With rapid advances in technology come new challenges and opportunities. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Four everyday AI competencies for Singaporeans to make Smart Nation 2.0 work
title_page: Four everyday AI competencies for Singaporeans to make Smart Nation 2.0 work | The Straits Times
maintext:
With the launch of Singapore’s Smart Nation 2.0 strategy by Prime Minister Lawrence Wong this week, the country strides into a future powered by artificial intelligence (AI). This refreshed vision focuses on three key goals: Trust, Growth and Community – ensuring that digital technology improves lives, drives economic progress, and fosters inclusivity.
AI, a key driver of this strategy, is no longer confined to tech firms and laboratories. It is embedded in the apps we use daily, from streaming recommendations to virtual assistants managing our schedules.
